Cluster Analysis¶

pytraj.cluster.kmeans(traj=None, n_clusters=10, random_point=True, kseed=1, maxit=100, distance_metric='rms', mask='*', top=None, output_op='', dtype='ndarray', *args, **kwd)¶

perform clustering and return cluster index for each frame

Returns:1D numpy array

Examples

>>> from pytraj.cluster import kmeans
>>> kmeans(traj)
>>> kmeans(traj, n_clusters=5)
>>> kmeans(traj, n_clusters=5, mask='@CA')
